title: New Braum, Karma and Graves skins for Snowdown!
body:
It's getting colder!


https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Cxzv81-VEAI9sP2.jpg
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Cxzu4q5UoAA8Jq7.jpg
https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VWBNndM6WSA/WDNV6JlOeHI/AAAAAAAA__Y/bXMZp07c9iYcZp4j9zVxXG0PuR-NOrHegCLcB/s1600/Braum_Splash_10.jpg
Santa Braum

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Cxzv5clVEAAHndK.jpg
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CxzvFyCVEAAAIOI.jpg
Winter Wonder Karma 

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Cxzv1MOVEAUFRDV.jpg
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Cxzu8qCVEAAc721.jpg
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dK4sqI3xq7w/WDNV6YTewqI/AAAAAAAA__g/PCsWV92N8vsYqWGbbDm_cEFpfbdFSHQagCLcB/s1600/Graves_Splash_7.jpg
Snowday Graves.

replies.body:
Santa Braum is perfect! So tempted to get that!

The Karma skin is beautiful!!! Her recall is gorgeous!

The Graves skin is overall fantastic as well! That W is amazing and his recall is funny.
Karma is very beautiful. I wonder if they can do something more with W as it looks like they just recolored it to blue. I do see some hint of snowflakes but it isn't prominent.
That Karma... Dammit Riot! No! You can't let me fall in love with this champion even more!
can anyone tell me when they will be released because i instantly will buys this graves and braum skin so god damn awsome
No. They never give us release dates as things change and get delayed.  They will be out sometime in patch 6.24 which is in two weeks.
Maybe next year? (keep hoping :)) I want one too.
Really....was looking forward to Bad Santa Kench. Or an Illaoi skin at all really. Or maybe skins for champs that I DON'T KNOW haven't gotten one in 3-4+ YEARS?

Kench got a skin in April, he's not Ahri, he can't have multiple in a year XDD

Illaoi I'd like to see a new one for though, hopefully sooon :(
Did they forget to mention the new Yorick skin with snow shovel and open roof igloo??? I don't see it anywhere....... Come on rito
Sorry but it's gonna take a bit more time before he gets a skin.  He just had his update about 2 months ago, so they didn't have the time to plan a skin for this season.
Yeah was really hoping for a winter skin for him as well(with snowmen for mistwalkers),but well,there is always a next year....
Updated now with turnarounds and ability previews!
